about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of ZOMBIE RAID — an atmospheric PvP top-down shooter, where the intensity of battles merges with the strategic depth of character progression. Immerse yourself in a dynamic survival world where every shot, every choice matters.

GAME FEATURES

  • REALISTIC BALLISTICS:
    Master the art of precise shooting in conditions of realistic ballistics. Each shot becomes crucial, and your shooting skills are vital in the midst of chaos and a zombie apocalypse.
  • OBSTACLE PENETRATION:
    Break through cover using an advanced obstacle penetration system. Strategically use the environment, knowing that bullets realistically pierce obstacles, unveiling new tactical possibilities.
  • GAS PROPAGATION:
    Engage in tactical gameplay with advanced gas dispersion and smoke simulation that adds a strategic element to every encounter.

  • WEAPON UPGRADES:
    Customize and upgrade your arsenal with a comprehensive weapon upgrade system. Transform your favorite weapons into instruments of mass destruction tailored for your playstyle.
  • CHARACTER SKILLS:
    Customize your character to your preferred playstyle with a diverse set of personal perks. Choose from various abilities that amplify your strengths and compensate for weaknesses, creating a unique and personalized build..
  • DIVERSE CHARACTERS:
    Choose from four distinct characters, each with a unique playstyle and abilities:
    ▫ RIFLEMAN: Frontline warrior with proficiency in armor and heavy weaponry.
    ▫ SNIPER: Master of precision shooting and stealth, eliminating enemies from a distance.
    ▫ ENGENEER: Tactical expert with skills in setting traps and fortifications.
    ▫ MEDIC: Key support, capable of healing and reviving teammates on the brink of death.

    GAME MODES


  • RAID:
    Raid infected city, kill zombies and collect loot. Beware of other raiders on your way.
  • SQUAD COMBAT:
    Unite in squads of four, where each character contributes to victory with unique abilities.
  • DEATHMATCH:
    Showcase your unique character build in a "everyone for themselves" mode, where selected perks and upgraded weapons can turn the tide of battle.
  • DUEL:
    Test your abilities in one-on-one PvP duels, demonstrating the strength of your chosen playstyle.
  • HORDE:
    Cooperate with other players, using both upgraded weapons and personal perks to withstand endless waves of zombies.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game  features intense violence, blood and gore (but the top-down perspective helps soften the impact).
